00003 #ifndef ASCII_ELEMENT_H
00004 #define ASCII_ELEMENT_H
00005 
00006 #include "InstructionElement.h"
00007 
00008 /*
00009         Design Pattern Used: Composite
00010         Class: AsciiElement
00011         Parent: InstructionElement
00012         One of the Leaf(s) in the Composite Structure.
00013         Processes Ascii type elements
00014 */
00015 
00016 
00017 
00018 namespace BabelShark
00019 {
00020         class AsciiElement: public InstructionElement
00021         {
00022                 public:
00023                         AsciiElement(unsigned int size, char* name);
00024                         ~AsciiElement();
00025 
00026                         //Will be used to read in data from packet
00027                         void Interpret(char* buffer);
00028 
00029                         //will be used to Display data to the WireShark output
00030                         char* Display();
00031                 private:
00032             // Checks to see if a character is printable.  if it is, it returns
00033                         //a string with that character stored in it.
00034                         //if not, it returns a string with a single space in it.
00035             std::string AsciiElement::Printable(char inChar);
00036         };
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 #endif //ASCII_ELEMENT_H
